verses.verse: Do any of you having something against another boldly go to the court facing the unjust and not before God's people?
Don't you know that God's people will judge the world? And if the world will be judged by you, are you unworthy to judge the smallest matters?
Don't you know that we will judge angels? How much more the things that pertain to this life?
Then when you need judicial decisions regarding things pertaining to this life, do you set them before those who have no standing in the church?
I say this to your shame. Is it so that there is not a wise man among you, not even one who will be able to judge between his brethren?
Yet brother goes to law with brother and that before the unbelievers.
Now isn't there already a failure among you, because you have lawsuits against one another? Why don't you take the wrong instead? Why don't you put up with being cheated?
But, you, YOU, do wrong and cheat and [your] brethren no less.
Don't you know that the unrighteous will not inherit the kingdom of God? Don't be deceived. Neither fornicators, idolaters, adulterers, effeminate, sodomites,
thieves, covetous, drunkards, verbal abusers, nor extortioners will inherit the kingdom of God.
And such were some of you, but now you are washed, but now you are purified, but now you are declared righteous in the name of the Lord Jesus and by the Spirit of our God.
All things may be lawful for me, but all things are not helpful; all things may be lawful for me, but I will not be brought under the control of any.
Foods are for the stomach and the stomach for food, but God will destroy both it and them. Now the body is not for fornication but for the Lord and the Lord for the body.
And God has both raised the Lord and will also raise us by his own power.
Don't you know that your bodies are members of Christ? Will I then take the members of Christ and make them members of a harlot? Absolutely not!
What, don't you know that he who is joined to a harlot is one body?..."for two," he says, "will be one flesh."
But he who is joined to the Lord is one spirit.
Flee fornication. Every sin that a man does is outside the body, but he who commits fornication sins against his own body.
What, don't you know that your body is the temple of the Holy Spirit, who is in you, which you have from God, and you are not your own?
For you are bought with a price, therefore glorify God in you body and in your spirit, which are God's.
